comments:

It looks like a lazy loading issue - the model presentation has to be loaded in 
the UI thread, but we are loading it from an evaluation thread.
*** Bug 26497 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Joe, I believe the fix is to change the following fields to be lazily 
initialized, and change all accesses to accessor methods (which do the lazy 
init):

fJavaElementImageRegistry
fDebugImageRegistry
fJavaLabelProvider
*** Bug 30519 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
